name: Pan
description: Pan, god of forests, wildlife and shepherds, bears the head and torso of a human, with the legs, horns, and ears of a goat.

skills.name: Panic Whispers
skills.description: Pan attacks the enemy with the highest current Energy, dealing DMG equal to 50% of ATK 4 times and draining all their Energy.

upgrades.level2: When cast, it deals 5% more DMG for every 100 Energy the target has.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG per hit to 60% ATK.
upgrades.level4: When cast, it deals 10% more DMG for every 100 Energy the target has.

skills.name: Pandean Pipes
skills.description: Targets the farthest enemy and dazes them for 4s (Daze: Enemies cannot move but are awakened when taking DMG exceeding 10% of their max HP in a single hit).

upgrades.level2: Increases the duration of Daze to 7s.
upgrades.level3: Enemies cannot regen Energy when dazed.
upgrades.level4: If a dazed enemy Deity is awakened by an attack, the attack deals 1.5 times the DMG.

skills.name: Rustic Murmur
skills.description: Whenever an enemy's Energy exceeds 99%, Pan silences that enemy for 3s. This effect can only trigger once every 15s.

upgrades.level3: This effect can only trigger once every 10s.
upgrades.level4: When the effect is triggered, Pan restores 100 Energy.

skills.name: Shepard's Dread
skills.description: Targets the nearest enemy, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK to them and surrounding enemies, and inflicts Terror on them for 4s (Terror: Reduces Move SPD by 90% and causes enemies to flee).

upgrades.level4: TThe enemy's ATK SPD is reduced by 40% within 4s after Terror ends.

relic.name: The Goat's Bond
relic.description: Any debuff applied by Pan deals 60% of his ATK as DMG per sec to its bearer.

upgrades.level2: Any debuff applied by Pan deals 80% of his ATK as DMG per sec to the bearer.
upgrades.level3: For each debuff on the target, DMG dealt to that target is increased by 50% stacking up to 4 times.
upgrades.level4: Any debuff applied by Pan deals 100% of his ATK as DMG per sec to the bearer.
